trans-unit.source: New features in Manage Workflows for Supplier Invoices

seg-source.mrk: New features in Manage Workflows for Supplier Invoices

target.mrk: 공급업체 송장 워크플로우 관리의 새로운 기능

trans-unit.source: With this app, you can now do the following:

seg-source.mrk: With this app, you can now do the following:

target.mrk: 이제 이 앱에서 다음과 같은 기능을 수행할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: You can define as start condition that an invoice is blocked due to price variance and/or due to quantity variance.

seg-source.mrk: You can define as start condition that an invoice is blocked due to price variance and/or due to quantity variance.

target.mrk: 송장이 가격 차이 및/또는 수량 차이로 인해 보류되는 시작 조건을 정의할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Depending on the workflow result, you can assign an email template and define the recipients. The email template offers more details such as the invoice number, company code, supplier, or gross amount.

seg-source.mrk: Depending on the workflow result, you can assign an email template and define the recipients.
The email template offers more details such as the invoice number, company code, supplier, or gross amount.

target.mrk: 워크플로우 결과에 따라 전자메일 템플릿을 지정하고 수신자를 정의할 수 있습니다.
전자메일 템플릿에는 송장 번호, 회사 코드, 공급업체, 총액과 같은 세부사항이 제공됩니다.

trans-unit.source: If you have configured a decision reason with decision reason ID <cite>OTHERS</cite> in your <uicontrol>Configuration Environment</uicontrol>, it is mandatory, that the approver enters a comment during the rejection of the work item in the app <uicontrol>My Inbox</uicontrol>.

seg-source.mrk: If you have configured a decision reason with decision reason ID <cite>OTHERS</cite> in your <uicontrol>Configuration Environment</uicontrol>, it is mandatory, that the approver enters a comment during the rejection of the work item in the app <uicontrol>My Inbox</uicontrol>.

target.mrk: <uicontrol>구성 환경</uicontrol>에서 결정 사유 ID가 <cite>기타</cite>인 결정 사유를 구성했으면, 승인자가 <uicontrol>내 수신함</uicontrol>에 있는 작업 항목을 거부할 때 반드시 주석을 입력해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For the scenario <cite>Workflow for Parked Invoice as Complete</cite>, you can also define that the supplier invoice is automatically posted.

seg-source.mrk: For the scenario <cite>Workflow for Parked Invoice as Complete</cite>, you can also define that the supplier invoice is automatically posted.

target.mrk: <cite>완료로 임시 저장된 송장의 워크플로우</cite>라는 시나리오에서는 공급업체 송장이 자동으로 전기되는 것을 정의할 수도 있습니다.
